text: Neuilly-Crimolois is a commune in the Côte-d'Or department in eastern France. It was established on 28 February 2019 by merger of the former communes of Neuilly-lès-Dijon (the seat) and Crimolois.Arrêté préfectoral 4 February 2019 ==Transportation== The commune has a railway station, , on the Dijon–Vallorbe line. ==See also== *Communes of the Côte-d'Or department ==References== Category:Communes of Côte-d'Or Category:States and territories established in 2019 Category:Populated places established in 2019
title: Neuilly-Crimolois
